meta.title: Muskegon Montessori Academy for Environmental Change Muskegon Montessori Academy for Environmental Change

meta.name: description
meta.content: Muskegon Montessori Academy for Environmental Change is tuition-free Montessori school serving students in PK-8. It is located in Norton Shores, MI.
Muskegon Montessori Academy for Environmental Change
Muskegon Montessori Academy for Environmental Change is tuition-free Montessori school serving students in PK-8. It is located in Norton Shores, MI.
Muskegon Montessori Academy for Environmental Change

body.class: home page-template page-template-page-t-home page-template-page-t-home-php page page-id-5 tribe-no-js

img.alt: Muskegon Montessori Academy for Environmental Change

li.a: Letter from our Head of School
Before and After School Child Care
Continuity of Learning & COVID-19 Response Plan

div.div:
Muskegon Montessori Academy for Environmental Change
*Click here to access updates regarding COVID-19*
Muskegon Montessori Academy for Environmental Change (MMAEC) is a tuition-free kindergarten through eighth-grade public school. Tuition-based preschool is also offered.
Here, you can expect a school where children's natural desire to learn is celebrated, where moving at their own pace is encouraged, and their unique learning style is embraced.
READ MORE >
Curious about Montessori? Fill out the form below to find out how you can get involved and learn more.

input.name: INTERESTS[8dec4bec05][]
input.value: Interested in getting involved in Montessori community
input.label: Yes, I'm interested in getting involved in the Montessori community.

input.name: INTERESTS[8dec4bec05][]
input.value: Receive frequent communication about Montessori education and the school
input.label: Yes, I'd like to receive frequent communication about Montessori education and the school.

form.label: Leave this field empty if you're human:

div.div:
Thank you for your understanding as we work to make our website ADA compliant.
© 2020 Muskegon Montessori Academy for Environmental Change. MMAEC is a Choice Schools Associates Montessori school. Title IX Information
Get Adobe Acrobat Reader

for Environmental Change
